author: 143martiev
title: Stay at Lanzerac -
text: We traveled to Lanzerac to celebrate our wedding anniversary. We got the best treatment from all staff. Excellent service from arrival to departure. Our dinner at the Governors Hall was very special, our table was decorated with roses and rose petals. We will recommend this hotel to everyone looking for attention to detail. The room are luxurious and the estate are well looked after.
